prodNameC: 愛德凡司 D-二元體標準試劑
ingredientsDesc: Advanced D-Dimer Reagent：lyophilized; contains polystyrene particles, mouse monoclonal antibodies, human serum albumin, tricine(0.02 mol/L), sucrose (maximum 50 g/L).Advanced D-Dimer Accelerator： lyophilized; prepared from pooled plasma from selected healthy donors, supplemented with a standardized D-Dimer reference preparation, stabilized with Hepes Buffer Solution (12g/L).Advanced D-Dimer Reconstitution Medium： liquid, physiological buffered saline.Advanced D-Dimer Standard Plasma ： is prepared from pooled plasma from selected, healthy donors, supplemented with a standardized reference D-dimer preparation, stabilized with Hepes Buffer Solution (12g/L) and lyophilized.Advanced D-Dimer Control Plasma 1/2：is prepared from pooled plasma from selected, healthy donors, supplemented with a standardized reference D-Dimer preparation, stabilized with Hepes Buffer Solution (12g/l) and lyophilized.
applicantName: 西斯美三東股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台北市中山區松江路318號13樓之3
efficacy: Advanced D-Dimer是一項以乳膠技術加強比濁反應的試驗, 以定量方式偵測人類血漿中交互作用下的纖維蛋白退化產物(D-Dimer)。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: B 血液學及病理學裝置
